segments.text: I ’ ll need to meet with you before you go on vacation , Alex . I have a few things to clear up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll be glad to . But my schedule is super tight this week . I think the only time I have free is at lunch on Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s fine . I can make that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , then . I ’ ll see you at noon on Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S2
